hero.title: Your Trusted Partner for U.S.

hero.description: We provide clear solutions to complex US tax and accounting challenges and offer customized solutions for Korean companies' successful US market entry.

about.title: For Korean Companies
about.description: With deep understanding of Korean business culture and expertise in the U.S. business environment, we are your optimal partner for successful U.S. expansion.

experience.title: 15+ Years of Expertise
experience.description: With over 15 years of accumulated experience in the U.S. market, we provide customized services tailored to Korean companies' unique needs.

onestop.title: One-Stop Solution
onestop.description: From company formation to tax filing, accounting audits, and consulting - all U.S. business services in one place.

network.title: Global Network

services.title: Expert Services for
services.description: From company formation to tax management, our specialists provide integrated solutions.

incorporation.title: Business Formation & Operations
incorporation.description: Supporting the entire process from selecting the optimal entity type to formation and operations for your business objectives.

tax.title: Tax Planning & Strategy
tax.description: Complete understanding of complex U.S. tax systems including federal, state, and sales tax with optimal tax-saving strategies.

accounting.title: Accounting & Financial Management
accounting.description: Supporting transparent financial operations with accurate financial statements per GAAP standards and systematic accounting management.

consulting.title: Business Consulting
consulting.description: Providing step-by-step customized consulting from U.S. market entry strategy to localization and growth planning.

hr.title: HR & Payroll Management
hr.description: Supporting stable organization operations and growth through U.S. labor law compliance and systematic HR management.

it.title: IT Solution Implementation
it.description: Maximizing productivity through implementation and optimization of core systems for efficient business operations.

process.title: For Guaranteed Results
process.description: From initial consultation to ongoing support, experts accompany you at every step.

consultation.title: Free Consultation

execution.title: Strategy Execution
execution.description: Executing from company formation to operations according to established strategy.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Providing continuous management and support for stable operations.

location.title: Covering All of America
location.description: Different tax regulations in each state, wondering where to expand? We provide localized expert services at major business hubs.
location.mainDescription: From Texas tax benefits to Delaware's incorporation advantages, our experts who fully understand each state and city's characteristics present optimal expansion strategies.
